description.text: Attacks with a sword, with a 35% chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn, dealing damage proportional to the caster's lost Health. When this skill is used, if it was not triggered by a Dual Attack and the caster has a buff, this skill changes into an attack that targets all enemies. This attack does not trigger a Dual Attack.
description.multipliers:
ATK*0.85*1*1.871 (1.35 soul burn)
                                        
                                                                                    0.15% increased damage per 1% self Health missing
description.text_ja: 敵単体に攻撃し、35%の確率で命中率DOWNを1ターンの間付与する。自身の現在の生命力が低いほどダメージがUPする。
description.burn_ja: ダメージがUPする。(魂力10消費)

description.text: Grants immortality and increased Evasion for 1 turn when the caster receives lethal damage and resets skill cooldown of Apocalypse. Can only be activated once every 9 turns.
description.text_ja: 自身が気絶するダメージを受けた時、不死を1ターンの間付与し、【黙示録】のスキルターンが0になる。この効果は9ターンに1回まで発動する。自身が強化状態の場合、自身のターンで発動する【虚空斬】が全体攻撃に変化し、連携攻撃が発生しない。

description.text: Attacks the enemy by exploding the Archdemon's Might contained within their sword, increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns. If the enemy is defeated, extends any buffs granted to the caster by 1 turn. Deals damage proportional to the caster's lost Health.
description.multipliers:
ATK*1.7*0.9*1.871
                                        
                                                                                    0.3% increased damage per 1% self Health missing
description.text_ja: 敵単体に攻撃し、自身に攻撃力UPを2ターンの間付与する。このスキルで敵を気絶させた場合、自身の強化効果を1ターン延長させる。自身の現在生命力が低いほどダメージがUPする。
